title: Merle Tabor Stern

title: Maria Margarita Snyder
description: Maria Margarita Snyder, 63, of Yuba City California, peacefully passed away, Monday, December 22, 2025. Maria was a beautiful and kind soul that always cared for others before herself and used her Reiki and deep spirituality to bring comfort, joy, and peace to others. title: George Earl Meggers
description: George Earl Meggers, retired USAF Lt. Col., marked his passage from life on the eve of December 15, 2025 in Vacaville, CA, at the age of 78. title: Jack Allen Samuelson
description: Jack Allen Samuelson passed away peacefully on December 9th surrounded by family at his treasured home overlooking Santa Cruz. He was 91 years old, just a month short of celebrating his 92nd birthday. title: John (Jack) Paul Brown
description: John (Jack) Paul Brown, 92, of San Pedro passed away peacefully surrounded by family on December 20, 2025. Jack was born on March 10, 1933 to Robert and Agnes Brown in Long Beach, California. title: Ann flynn
description: Ann Ghering Flynn died peacefully on Christmas Eve 2025. title: Best Quantum Computing Stocks To Watch Today – January 1st
description: D-Wave Quantum, IonQ, and Quantum Computing are the three Quantum Computing stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool.
